title: Morristown National Historical Park: Scouts
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer     Scouts              Scouts         Resource Stewardship Scout Ranger patch NPS  Calling all Scouts!  Resource Stewardship Scout Ranger Program Promote, Encourage, Inspire, Empower! How to get started: 1. Visit the Scout Ranger website - For Boy Scouts, click here to find out more information about the program. - For Girl Scouts, click here to find out more information about the program.  2. Visit www.nps.gov/findapark to select a national park site in your area 3. Think about activities your troop would be interested in and determine your available time frame for completion. 4. Contact the park's educational and/ or volunteer services to discuss possible options. 5. Work together with the park to plan the program or project. Volunteer a minimum of five hours at one or more national park site scouts earn the certificate. Volunteer for a minimum of 10 hours to achieve both the certificate and patch.
